php.ERR_SCRIPT_EXISTS_FUNCTION_NOT: Scriptul există dar nu conține numele funcției importate.
php.ERR_FAILED_TO_SAVE_SCRIPT: Failed to save workflow methods script file.
php.ERR_ILLEGAL_FIELD_VALUE: Illegal value has been entered for this field type. Field name: %s, Module: %s, Value: %s
php.ERR_VALUE_IS_TOO_LONG: Character limit exceeded. Field name: %s, Module: %s, Value: %s
php.ERR_VALUE_IS_TOO_SHORT: Entered value is too short. Field name: %s, Module: %s, Value: %s
php.ERR_TO_MANY_FILES: Too many files transferred - limit was exceeded. Field name: %s, Module: %s, Value: %s
php.ERR_VALUE_CAN_NOT_BE_LESS_THAN_ZERO: The field value must be greater than zero. Field name: %s, Module: %s, Value: %s
php.ERR_NOT_ALLOWED_VALUE: Valoare incorecta detectata, te rugam contacteaza administratorul
php.ERR_PASSWORD_HAS_ALREADY_BEEN_USED: Aceasta parola a fost deja utilizata. Din motive de securitate sistemul nu accepta parole deja utilizate.
php.ERR_USER_EXISTS: Utilizator cu acelasi nume d eutilizator si rol exista deja (%s)
php.ERR_NO_PERMISSIONS_FOR_THE_RECORD: Nu ai permisiunile necesare pentru a vedea/modifica aceasta inregistrare. Contacteaza administratorul programului daca ai nevoie sa vezi aceasta inregistrare
php.ERR_CONTENTS_VARIABLE_CANT_CALLED_FUNCTI: Continutul variabilei (%s) nu poate fi declansat ca functie
php.ERR_SPECIAL_CHARACTERS_NOT_ALLOWED: Caractere speciale ca %s nu sunt permise
php.ERR_FILE_CODE_INJECTION: File contains dangerous code and was rejected
php.ERR_FILE_XPACKET_CODE_INJECTION: Fisierul contine cod XPACKET periculos si a fost respins
php.ERR_NO_PERMISSIONS_TO_CREATE_DIRECTORIES: Nu aveti permisiuni pentru a crea directoare de fisiere
php.ERR_NUMBER_OF_ARGUMENTS_NOT_ALLOWED: Number of arguments not allowed (%d %s in %s)
php.ERR_RECORD_NOT_FOUND: There is no record with ID: %s
php.ERR_CURRENCY_TABLE_DOWNLOAD: Error while downloading the exchange rate table.
php.ERR_CANNOT_CONNECT_TO_REMOTE: Error while connecting to remote server
php.ERR_ERROR_WHILE_SENDING_DATA: Error while sending data, there is probably some error/missing data.
php.ERR_OBJECT_MUST_HAVE_INTERFACE: The object must have an interface %s
php.ERR_PAID_FUNCTIONALITY: %s paid functionality, you must purchase it
php.ERR_TOKEN_DOES_NOT_EXIST: The token does not exist or has expired
php.ERR_TOKEN_NOT_EXECUTION_CONDITIONS: The token does not meet the conditions for execution
php.ERR_FUNCTION_NOT_FOUND_IN_CLASS: Function %s not found in class %s object
php.ERR_REQUIRED_VALUE_MISSING: The field value is missing or is not supported
php.ERR_DETECTED_ERRORS_CURRENT_RECORD: Problems or errors have been detected in this record. Please review the following message and modify the data accordingly.
php.ERR_DETECTED_ERRORS_WILL_DISAPPEAR: The error will disappear only after the appropriate mechanisms are activated once the correction is made. This may take several minutes depending on your configuration.
php.ERR_IMAP_CONNECTION: There was a problem accessing your e-mail account. Verify the correctness of the e-mail account settings.
php.ERR_REGISTER_FILES_PERMISSIONS: Incorrect permissions on files or directory %s
php.ERR_PLEASE_USE_LATIN_CHARACTERS: Please make sure to use Latin characters only
php.ERR_RECREATE_APP_ACCESS: The system has detected a change in the basic registration data. The add-ons you purchased may not be available. Please contact your provider in case of any issues.
